mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM quiz.t_user AS u INNER JOIN quiz.user_roles AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN quiz.m_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN quiz.role_permissions AS rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN quiz.m_permission AS p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
